text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus burkillii is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. It has been named after Isaac Henry Burkill.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Lithocarpus burkillii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31496A9633473. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31496A9633473.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
